name: The Great Tsunami
description:
The Great Tsunami

Ride the wave and help our hero Tsunami to rid the sea by monsters of Japanese mythology! The game is totally hand designed and fully developed in 48 hours during the Global Game Jam 2017! (Politecnico di Milano, Italy)

You can play with space button, mouse or touch :)

Made during Global Game Jam 2017 at Politecnico di Milano
Theme: Waves

Credits:

Yuri Fusca - Game Designer
Roberto Baldi - Developer
Hellen Giussani - Graphic Designer
Marco Buriola - Graphic Designer
Silvio Cafferati - Graphic Designer

Especially thanks to
Federico Di Cera e Davide Pensato ( DPSTUDIOS)
for game music and sounds
